title: Application
description: The entites related to Application usage.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/metrics/crashes.description: Triggered when the application does not exit gracefully. Event is sent on application launch after a crash.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/metrics/feature.description: Activation(s) of an application feature that is being measured.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/metrics/install.description: Install of an application on a device where the actual install event is available.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/metrics/first-l.description: Triggered on first launch after install.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/metrics/launche.description: Launch of an application. Triggered on every run, including crashes and installs. Also triggered on a resume from background when the lifecycle session timeout has been exceeded.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/metrics/upgrade.description: Upgrade of an application that has previously been installed. Triggered on first launch after upgrade.
